body: Dear Abraham Many deep thanks for your time,  I ran the simulation, unfortunately the surface results remained unreadable , eg  * this is an error msg "1. None of the connected srfData could be matched with the surfaces in the connected HBZones." [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6ncfsqRfD9086Qv-0tqmZ6puBin706zSc5aeJe88TRUYCylGVRLf3bMgMc8Bi3UV04gCnftD49HcaAufmtbfGuPm/srfc.JPG) * in addition, the surface results could be red by the " Surface data based on type" but could not by the " detailed one". and it showed this Msg "1. Solution exception:'Brep' object has no attribute 'upper'" [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6neV5NDKMQpzL5j9qK-6jYmMYrUJYuUxGlWVX0Ieq1VpR5fqnOA6CcP4pw*pPwEdDoNzhqkUcyGZMODKgEikmngI/srfcbasedontype.JPG) * compared to the earlier model, I noticed that the new simulation results have changed a bit, the zones tend to be more "sensitive to sun" as if it have a lower thermal capacity/ less thermal mass, meanwhile the cooling load is reduced! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6nf9bgdamfVQtZoYvFA4t4sv50JLbeh*1fkDhoXzLXsYabSFey5vpEXXe2K2Bw84LVPmiziRDVPrXUQBeU*DSlZp/basecase.JPG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6nf0-vALBl3a3lTBBvfduaKvXbWU-c4*BEgkWXjo2l*oq1lTe3jUg5DVeskIIGei*rARnVdkE5C51pOgU3c7esvs/abrahameditedmodel.JPG) * although I was able to collect the CSV files form the Run E+ component, the IDF file was showing this error "1. Solution exception:'NoneType' object is unsubscriptable" I thought the IDF file is kind of a early check up for the geometry before running the simulation, as in Chris tutorial ([Chris tutorial no 7](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6r6TovMcQfM&index=8&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_)) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6nc6sVf*G059lWZ03S2ZvrUqekoqpdTJix4s2NIHUmgkie*yPF6ItIMyFuntytY9SwHX0JfEEfqqLLa9n7ALXaLH/IDFerrorwhileCSVworks.JPG) sorry for the very long Msg, I hope I find a way to deeply understand these results.
